item.title: The Psychoanalyst Who Believed Holocaust Survivors Were More Than Just Victims
item.description: Anna Ornstein, an Auschwitz survivor, wanted to change the way her field thought about those who endured the concentration camps.

item.title: Assata Shakur’s Freedom Came With Shattering Costs for Her and Her Family
item.description: The F.B.I. made her the first woman on their list of most-wanted terrorists.

item.title: Jill Sobule’s Fans Always Made Sure She Had a Place to Perform — and to Stay
item.description: After her label dropped her, supporters showed her she could still make it in music.

item.title: When Terence Stamp, Bad Boy of ‘60s Cinema, Left Acting for an Ashram
item.description: After a decade away from the movies, he had a remarkable second act.

item.title: The Track and Field Star Who Casually Shattered Race and Gender Barriers
item.description: Mabel Landry Staton was one of the first Black, female long-jumpers in the history of the Olympics.

item.title: The Hip-Hop Trailblazer Who Demanded Recognition — and Pay — for Her Work
item.description: Angie Stone always knew she had what it took to make it, even if the music industry did not.

item.title: The Activist Who Became Radicalized by Working on ‘Our Bodies, Our Selves’
item.description: Norma Swenson exposed the systematic sexism within the medical establishment.

item.title: There Was No Villain Michelle Trachtenberg Couldn’t Play
item.description: The actress seemed to channel her childhood bullies when playing deliciously vindictive characters.

item.title: D’Wayne Wiggins’s Songs Were Embraced by Everyone From Church Ladies to Biggie
item.description: With Tony! Toni! Toné!, his songs captured the mood of how people lived and died in Oakland.

item.title: Birthdays Can Be Disappointing. But Not if You Bake Your Own Cake.
item.description: A birthday can happen to you, or you can make it happen yourself.

item.title: The Diary of a Jeffrey Epstein Girlfriend Shows How He Used Women
item.description: A Bear Stearns executive introduced a 23-year-old employee to Epstein. She shared her diary with us.

item.title: What to Know About the Origins of Jeffrey Epstein’s Wealth
item.description: The sources of Epstein’s fortune have long been a source of speculation. Here are six takeaways from a Times investigation that found that he built it through scams, theft and lies.

item.title: Scams, Schemes, Ruthless Cons: The Untold Story of How Jeffrey Epstein Got Rich
item.description: For years, rumors swirled about where his wealth came from. A Times investigation reveals the truth of how a college dropout clawed his way to the pinnacle of American finance and society.
